statements: SELECT * FROM credit_scores;
SELECT user_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores;
SELECT id, user_id, credit_score, financial_goal FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score >= 700;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE financial_goal > 1000;
SELECT id, user_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, credit_score, financial_goal FROM credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY credit_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, AVG(credit_score) AS average_credit_score FROM credit_scores GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY average_credit_score DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_credit_score_entries FROM credit_scores GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_credit_score_entries > 2
SELECT id, user_id, credit_score, financial_goal FROM credit_scores WHERE financial_goal >= 50000 ORDER BY financial_goal ASC
SELECT user_id, MAX(credit_score) AS highest_credit_score FROM credit_scores GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY highest_credit_score DESC
SELECT * FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT user_id, credit_score, last_updated FROM CreditScores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT goal_name, amount, deadline FROM FinancialGoals WHERE amount > 50000;
SELECT * FROM CreditScores WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, goal_name, amount FROM FinancialGoals ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, goal_name, amount FROM FinancialGoals WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_goals FROM FinancialGoals GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_goals > 3;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM FinancialGoals GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT CreditScores.user_id, CreditScores.credit_score, FinancialGoals.goal_name FROM CreditScores INNER JOIN FinancialGoals ON CreditScores.user_id = FinancialGoals.user_id WHERE CreditScores.credit_score > 700 ORDER BY CreditScores.credit_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM CreditScores;
SELECT user_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT user_id, last_updated FROM CreditScores ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT user_id, goal_name, target_amount FROM FinancialGoals WHERE achieved = false;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM UserInformation WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM UserInformation WHERE email LIKE 'john.doe%';
SELECT user_id, goal_name, target_amount FROM FinancialGoals WHERE achieved = TRUE ORDER BY target_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, credit_score FROM CreditScores INNER JOIN UserInformation ON CreditScores.user_id = UserInformation.user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserInformation WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700);
SELECT * FROM CreditScores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM CreditScores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT goal_id, goal_description, target_amount FROM FinancialGoals WHERE achieved = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CreditHistory WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, notification_text, created_date FROM Notifications ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, last_updated FROM CreditScores ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT goal_id, customer_id, goal_description, target_amount, last_update_date FROM FinancialGoals WHERE achieved = true;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM CreditHistory WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, notification_text, created_date FROM Notifications WHERE customer_id = 123456;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, last_updated FROM CreditScores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, credit_score, last_updated FROM credit_scores;
SELECT goal_id, user_id, goal_name, goal_amount, completed FROM financial_goals;
SELECT user_id, name, email, phone_number FROM user_info;
SELECT history_id, user_id, credit_score, update_date FROM credit_history;
SELECT goal_id, goal_amount, completed_date FROM goals_history;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores ORDER BY credit_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores WHERE user_id = 123456;
SELECT user_info.name, financial_goals.goal_name, financial_goals.goal_amount FROM user_info JOIN financial_goals ON user_info.user_id = financial_goals.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(goal_id) AS num_goals FROM financial_goals GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_goals > 5;

SELECT credit_history.user_id, credit_scores.credit_score, credit_history.update_date FROM credit_history JOIN credit_scores ON credit_history.user_id = credit_scores.user_id ORDER BY credit_history.update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
